column2: The Brotherhood of the True Flame is a notorious arcane society based in Zakhara. Most members of this society are pure flame elementalists. Non-wizards also serve within the society, but hold much lower ranks compared to their elementalist brethren. This society holds the largest collection of wizards with the same goals and specializations within all of the Land of Fate. Their strongest fortresses are rumored to be located somewhere deep within the Weeping Desert and the Great Anvil.
The head of the Brotherhood of the True Flame is known as the Sarvoch'alaav, or Bonfire Supreme.
